thread.title: ALMAG Aluminum Appoints Joe Jackman to Role of President

author: cnbc.com
title: ALMAG Aluminum Appoints Joe Jackman to Role of President
text:
BRAMPTON, Ontario--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Bob Peacock, CEO of ALMAG Aluminum announced the promotion of Joe Jackman, currently General Manager and Executive Vice President to the role of President at the company’s annual meeting.
“Joe has been a key contributor to our growth and success, in particular over the past 8 years as part of our Leadership Team,” said Peacock, who will remain active in the business as CEO. “Joe’s drive, energy and passion for providing solutions, not just products, to customers has strengthened our position as an industry leader.”
Jackman joined ALMAG in 2000 as Territory Sales Manager and was promoted to Vice President of Sales and Marketing in 2010 and General Manager in 2016. In these roles, he demonstrated successful promotion and development of ALMAG’s core competencies. Joe’s strong leadership and strategic ability will carry on the company’s 65-year long passion for innovation in both extrusion and value added products. He will continue to build a strong team rooted in the 4 Core Values of Respect & Fairness, Humility, Passion For Progress and Ownership.
About ALMAG Aluminum Inc. ( almag.com )
With over 300 employees, operating from plants in Brampton ON and Ardmore AL, ALMAG Aluminum has built a reputation as an industry leader in extruding high-visual, tight tolerance, thin-walled, and complex aluminum extrusions. ALMAG is focused on four pillars of service; Design, Extrude, Fabricate and Finish to provide Customers with ‘Smarter, Better and Faster’ solutions, making ALMAG your single-source supplier for any aluminum extrusion project.
